headline: Network-layer DDoS attack trends for Q3 2020
keywords: DDoS, Trends, RDDoS, Ransom Attack, Fancy Bear, DDoS Reports
description: In Q3 ‘20, Cloudflare observed a surge in DDoS attacks, with double the number of DDoS attacks and more attack vectors deployed than ever — with a notable surge in protocol-specific DDoS attacks such as mDNS, Memcached, and Jenkins amplification floods.
